SPECIAL FINANCE MANAGER

SUMMARY

Seeking the position of Commercial Underwriter II where I may employ my expertise in Special Finance Management, Cost & Risk Analysis (LTV & DTI), Structured Negotiations, and Audit Controls.
Providing the company with the highest level of strategic services and profitability.
Highlights
Strong management skills in strategic planning, organizational re — engineering , budget analysis, process, productivity, and quality improvement.
Talented in leading and developing business opportunities and marketing strategies to maximize profitability.

ACCOMPLISHMENTS

Phi Beta Kappa Honor Society

After taking over special finance management position, increased the SSI (sales satisfaction index) from the mid 80's to 96%.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Sales Performance Specialist - Nashville

Location: Nashville, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Management, Sales

Description:
The Sales Performance Specialist (SPS) works with multiple Community Managers and Leasing Professionals to optimize overall sales performance for multiple assigned communities and are accountable for sales results. As an expert on all aspects of IRT’s sales strategy, processes, and related technology, the SPS contributes to the success of the team through the design and implementation of sales coaching initiatives which enhance the individual skills of each Leasing Professional.
*Must reside in or near Nashville
You’re a Coach:Train, develop, and coach leasing professionals to optimize individual and team performanceBuild out and deliver high-quality sales educational content, in partnership with our Learning and Development team, as a sales subject-matter expert. This can include digital presentations, how-to manuals, instructional videos, etc.Quality control of the sales process through interacting with leasing professionals, evaluating sales shops, listening to calls, and adjusting as necessary to ensure sales excellenceHost and lead sales meeting to improve sales process, as well as visit assigned communities
You’re an Analyst:Routinely assess the sales Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and provide a competent analysisIdentify opportunities for improvement and action plans to relevant stakeholders to optimize leasing and marketing performance and goalsMeasure the effectiveness of training programs and work with Director of Sales to adjust as necessaryRoutinely analyze lead activity and lead activity logs to ensure IRT sales and guest experience standards are met or exceeded
Experience & Requirements:4+ years’ experience in sales and sales management2+ years’ experience in multi-family working directly with prospects and residents (preferred)Ability to acquire expertise on property management software (experience using Entrata, LRO, or DOMO preferred)Strong customer service acumenExcellent verbal and written communication skillsHighly motivated and able to motivate and energize a sales teamAbility to travel to assigned communities (in-market or out-of-market) as needed (up to 50% travel)Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite applicationsMust have a Valid Driver’s License and automobile insurance coverage
We offer:Competitive Compensation PackageBonus OpportunitiesStock AwardsPaid Holidays and Paid Time OffBCBS PPO Health Insurance401k with 4% match
Independence Realty Trust is an Equal Opportunity Employer and committed to building a diverse and inclusive culture. We consider applicants for all positions without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, familial, marital or veteran status, disability, or any other legally protected classes

Experience Level (if available): Associate
<JD_END>
